original_text:
Have those who work evil no knowledge,
    who eat up my people as they eat bread,
    and do not call upon God?
korean_text: 죄악을 행하는 자들은 무지하냐 그들이 떡 먹듯이 내 백성을 먹으면서 하나님을 부르지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: Have those who work evil no knowledge
who eat up my people as they eat bread
sentences.korean_translation: 빵을 먹듯이 내 백성을 삼키는 자들

sentences.original_text: and do not call upon God?
